languages.text: "Это ты про трапезную, которую я... Кхм, обновил? Вини не меня, а мастера, что вытесал столь тесные кресла и хлипкие столы. Чуть кулаком, возвеселившись, пристукнешь — враз рассыпаются".
"When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."
languages.original_text: "Это ты про трапезную, которую я... Кхм, обновил? Вини не меня, а мастера, что вытесал столь тесные кресла и хлипкие столы. Чуть кулаком, возвеселившись, пристукнешь — враз рассыпаются".

traits.locale_text: "You mean the messroom, which I... ahem, renovated? Lay the blame not at my feet but at the feet of the craftsman who carved such cramped chairs and flimsy tables. When spirits are high, the slightest thump of a fist is enough to shatter such things."

"You mean the messroom, which I... ahem, renovated? Lay the blame not at my feet but at the feet of the craftsman who carved such cramped chairs and flimsy tables. When spirits are high, the slightest thump of a fist is enough to shatter such things."

"You mean the messroom, which I... ahem, renovated? Lay the blame not at my feet but at the feet of the craftsman who carved such cramped chairs and flimsy tables. When spirits are high, the slightest thump of a fist is enough to shatter such things."

"You mean the messroom, which I... ahem, renovated? Lay the blame not at my feet but at the feet of the craftsman who carved such cramped chairs and flimsy tables. When spirits are high, the slightest thump of a fist is enough to shatter such things."

languages.text: “我情绪激动的时候，只要稍微捶上一拳，那些脆弱不堪的玩意儿就被砸碎了。”
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是我刚刚……咳，重新装修过……的餐厅吗？这不能怪我，只能怪那些工匠怎么会造出那么狭窄的座椅和那么不解释的餐桌。我情绪激动的时候，只要稍微捶上一拳，就能砸碎那些玩意儿。”

languages.text: « Il me suffit de taper du poing sur la table dans un élan de bonne humeur pour briser en mille morceaux tout ce qui est un tant soit peu fragile. »
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez parler du réfectoire que j'ai... ahem, rénové ? Ce n'est pas à moi qu'il faut en vouloir, mais à l'artisan qui a conçu des chaises si étroites et des tables si fragiles. Il suffit de taper du poing sur la table dans un élan de bonne humeur pour la briser en mille morceaux. »

languages.text: "Wenn die Laune gut ist, reicht schon der kleinste Überschwang meiner Faust, um zerbrechliche Dinge zu zerschlagen."
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr meint die Offiziersmesse, die ich ... ähem, renoviert habe? Gebt nicht mir die Schuld, sondern dem Handwerker, der solch enge Stühle und zarte Tische gefertigt hat. Wenn die Laune gut ist, reicht schon die kleinste Faust auf dem Tisch, um solche Dinge zu zerschlagen."

languages.text: 「気分が高揚しているときは、拳で軽くたたくだけで、砕け散ってしまう」
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: 「私が…ごほん、改装した食堂のことかい？責任は私ではなく、このような窮屈な椅子や薄っぺらいテーブルを彫った職人にある。気分が高揚しているときは、拳で軽くたたくだけで、砕け散ってしまう」

languages.text: «Cuando la gente se anima, el más leve puñetazo sobre esas cosas tan frágiles las rompe».
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere al comedor que... ejem, renové? No me eche a mí la culpa, sino al artesano que talló sillas tan estrechas y mesas tan flojas. Cuando la gente se anima, el más leve puñetazo sobre ellas las rompe».

languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

languages.text: "Ortam alevlendiğinde o çürük şeyler ufacık bir fiskeyle bile kırılıveriyorlar."
languages.original_text: "When spirits are high, the exuberance of my fist is enough to shatter fragile things."

traits.locale_text: "Ortam alevlendiğinde o çürük şeyler ufacık bir fiskeyle bile kırılıveriyorlar."
